Class TestDungeonLevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Level
      • logic.TestDungeonLevel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TestDungeonLevel
extends Level
    Imitation of the first game level. Used for Unit testing purposes only.
